name: Hero TD
description:
HeroTD is a mid-core mobile game I worked on at M-Gun.
You have to attack other players defenses to steal their resources, based on a RPG and auto chess system.

I worked on the gameplay, game design, UI, optimization, online and database.

Available on the App Store :

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/hero-td/id6444678935?uo=2

and Google Play :

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fastlife.HeroTD
